name: Ruins of Krüger play in VR
name_original: Ruins of Krüger play in VR
description:
Ruins of Krüger play in VR

For Oculus Rift DK2

Ruins of Krüger are a WeirdPop / Bleach Funk / Post Post Punk Band from Berlin, Germany.
In this short musical experience the song "eternal party" is played "live" on a virtual mountain, way up in the air.

Grav Modulo installed the Mobile Disco to fight the loneliness on Uncanny Peak.

The experience makes use of the Oculus Spatializer and positional audio.

v0.2
Oculus Runtime 0.7.0.0
Should work with 0.8.0.0

Tested on Win7, i5, GTX770, 8GB RAM
Mac version untested!

Creative Commons CC BY 4.0
Jan Ahrens, Ruins of Krüger

http://grav-modulo.com

https://kitchenlegrecordsberlin.bandcamp.com/

http://ruinsofkrueger.tumblr.com/
